All dice of characters targeting or targeted by this character are unaffected by Power gain or loss, and their minimum and maximum values are lowered by 3. At the end of the Scene, all other characters take 15 damage, and this character fully restores Light.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The day when Big Bird’s eyes that could see hundreds of kilometers away, Long Bird who could judge any sin, and Small Bird’s mouth that could devour everything united into one, darkness fell upon the forest.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I can’t let evil take all these precious things away.
If I could devour everything around me…
We’ve joined forces to protect more people.
I have to hurry up and find them. I can’t have the beast destroy this place…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] All librarians gain 1 Haste at the start of each Scene for the duration of the reception. If all five librarians each have an Abnormality page, gain 1-2 Strength and Endurance in addition.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: That’s when the birds decided to become the guardians of the forest. They loved this forest more than anyone else did, so they wanted to protect the creatures living in the forest and keep the peace.

Dialogues.Dialogue: To protect this place we love more than anyone.
We hope for a world where pitiful lives can live in comfort.
We’re the only ones who can protect this place.
We should become the guardians instead, and save lives.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] When there is no 'Intruder' present, the first enemy the selected librarian attacks is marked as an 'Intruder'.(Excludes Mass Attacks) All of the Intruder's attacks deal 2-4 less physical and Stagger damage; also, the Intruder takes 1-2 bonus damage from attacks.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The bird began to prowl the forest, looking for the beast. But there was nothing. There were no creatures, no sun and moon, and no beast. All that was left was just a bird and the Black Forest.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Those who endure the fear will attain peace…
Nothing will dare harm you.
When you reach the end, there will be no such thing as fear…
Peace and quiet have returned to the forest.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] On a deflect, deal half of the Block dice roll as physical damage to the opponent.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Once it recognizes that it lost your attention and focus… It will spread its wings. Like an angel, its wings will reach the skies and extend toward the ground, eventually blocking the sun out.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Basking in everyone’s gaze and attention… It will finally come to fruition and spread its wings.
The one who spread their wings sacrificed everything they had, and yet…
If we ever open our eyes again, will we get to see the fruit of our labor in that gaze?
Do not come here… There is nothing but a thorny tree; it’s no place for you to rest…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] Deal +2-4 damage in a one-sided attack. In a clash, deal 3-6 less damage with attacks, but Block dice gain 1-3 Power.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: That’s what a gaze is. Attention. An invisible string that connects us. Sole focus.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Just close your eyes. That’s right, you’re doing good…
If you can’t see it, you can’t reach it.
The desire for the unreachable will only grow bigger. And to pursue it… is to tread a path riddled with thorns.
Once it’s brought within your cognizance… It will return to this deep, dark underground…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] Deal and take twice as much Stagger damage on a deflect.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Don’t look away, just keep your eyes on it. Contain it in your sight.

Dialogues.Dialogue: You won’t bat an eye at this breathtaking sight.
Keep looking at it… Steadily… It’s alive, watching you in return, is it not?
Contain it in your sight…
You watch me… and I watch you…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [All Allies] The player has 30 seconds to select Combat Pages before the combat phase begins each Scene. Boost the Power of all dice of all librarians by 1-2.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Time flows as life does, and life goes as time does.

Dialogues.Dialogue: That one doesn’t have enough time is a useless complaint.
Tomorrow may or may not come.
You’ll be given more time than you have lost.
Time is given to everyone evenly, but fate makes it unfair.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] Every 13th Combat Page the librarian plays gains 1-2 Power. (Excludes [On Play] pages) The dice on the page also gain the following effect: ‘[On Hit] Deal bonus damage equal to (Dice value)% of target's Max HP’.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: I know of absolute solitude. I shared my silence, and now I take its price. Once the time comes and the original owner arrives, the price will be paid.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I heard that disastrous bell yet again.
As the bell rang, a scream broke the silence at last…
The bell tolls for the last time, in a moment that never seemed to come.
I gave out my silence, and now I take its price.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] Add a 'Silence' page to the hand: ‘Cost 0 - [On Play] Take 15% of Max. HP as damage; all other characters lose 5 Speed’. Add an 'Amplify' page to the hand: ‘Cost 0 - [On Play] Take 10% of Max. HP as damage; Gain 5 Speed’. The page is also included in the deck at the start of subsequent Acts.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Rarely, I feel as if time has stopped. Fleeting moments of silence sometimes befall me.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Silence does not always bring peace.
An instant of silence, as if time had stopped.
When time stops, silence falls. In a way, they are one and the same.
Even when all has stopped, the soul will not perish.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] Add a 'Martyr' page to hand: ‘Cost 0 - [On Play] For this Scene, deal 4-6 bonus Stagger damage with attacks but take 1-3 damage after a successful attack’. The page is also included in the deck at the start of subsequent Acts.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Let us meet again as stars.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Let’s relish eternal happiness at the end of this universe together.
Life cannot resist the instincts; we all go back to that place someday.
We are not dying. We’re simply returning to where we belong.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] If any character is Staggered at the start of the Scene, they take 3-7 damage, and all allies gain 1 Strength for the Scene. (Multiple Staggered characters do not give more Strength)
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Our Blue Star is the only sanctuary that accepts us. We will be cleansed of our sins there.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Let us completely take off this filthy husk and shine brightly.
We shouldn’t let our anxiety fester inside us, busying ourselves trying to forget our wrongdoings by erasing them.
We’ll all eventually go back to that place and cleanse ourselves of all sin there.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [All Allies] All allies deal +2-4 Stagger damage for this Scene. The effect of this page activates every 3 Scenes afterwards.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The rise of a star is a brand new beginning. Don’t you hear the everlasting sound of the trumpet?

Dialogues.Dialogue: Can you hear this sound? The nostalgic echo we’ve been eagerly searching for?
Aah… At last…! It’s calling for us at last!
That call is guiding us to the only place that will accept us…!

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] Add a 'Baptism' page to hand: ‘Cost 2 - [On Play;] [Return to Hand] Target recovers 6 HP and gains 1 Endurance this Scene (Once per Scene)’. The page is also included in the deck at the start of subsequent Acts.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “I shall heal you, curing you of all disease and injury you possess.”

Dialogues.Dialogue: I am here to treat disease.
Place your trust in me. I am the only one who can help you.
Why have you not treated that scar?
I shall heal you, curing you of all disease and injury you possess.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] For the duration of the reception, restore 1 additional Light at the start of the Scene. If the selected librarian also has the Abnormality page 'Baptism', its effect is enhanced: ‘Target recovers 12 HP and gains 2 Endurance this Scene’.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “I am death and life. Darkness and light.”

Dialogues.Dialogue: Ye who are drenched in sin. Rise and face me.
I have not manifested myself in such a form to lay judgement.
I shall undo the restrictions that have imprisoned you in this place, and lead you to the paradise that welcomes everyone.
I shall be with ye as I relieve you of the fear of horrifying death.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [All Allies] Fully recover Stagger Resist, and purge all status ailments. (Also applies to Staggered librarians) For the duration of the reception, take 2 less Stagger damage from attacks.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: To be willing to bear pain is half the atonement.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] As long as there are other allies whom can be targeted, the selected librarian will not be targeted for attacks. If this character is alive at the end of the reception, resolve an additional book for every guest defeated.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “Thou art His Son; thou art the King.”

Dialogues.Dialogue: Ye who are full of blessings, rejoice. For I am with ye.
I shall guide you to the paradise that welcomes everyone.
I shall be with ye as I relieve you of the fear of horrifying death.
We shall bask in the fortune of being together forever, and none shall leave.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] While this character is alive, all other allies gain 2 Protection each Scene. If this character has used WhiteNight's E.G.O page, allies also absorb instances of 3 or less damage.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “Be not frightened. I am thy savior and I shall be with thee.”

Dialogues.Dialogue: Be at ease. No calamity shall be able to trouble you.
Ye will gain a body free of such corruption, so how could one deny that this is salvation.
Believe in me, and forever ye will be outside of the dark.
Ye will be revered, for I am divine.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Single Ally] While this character is alive, all other allies deal +2-7 damage with attacks. If the character has used 'Baptism' 12 or more times this reception, allies also gain +1 Power.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “Have not I chosen you twelve? Now rise, my servants. Rise and serve me.”

Dialogues.Dialogue: Pursue peace and holiness. Without these, ye shan’t look at me.
Those who endure until the end will be able to proceed.
Accept my grace, and I shall bury your errors in the past.
Obey me and revel in the eternal life and mirth.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the start of the Scene, gain 1 Strength.
At the start of the Scene, gain 1 Feeble and 2 Endurance.
When another ally gets attacked, gain 1 Strength next Scene (Twice per Scene)
At the start of the Scene, gain 1 Endurance.
